channel.title: Scams on Crypto Chasers Confidential

item.title: Informative Guide to Cryptocurrency Scams
item.description: You can’t really have a post regarding scams without first including the infamous Carlos Matos of Bitconnect. Later in the post we’ll briefly get into the rise and fall of Bitconnect and what it exactly is, and I’m sure most of you have already seen this clip but here it is in all of its glory - the notorious Carlos Matos at the Bitconnect Annual Ceremony: Lending Cryptocurrency Scams a.
